short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Hacker News user profiles by hovering over usernames

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hover over usernames on Hacker News and instantly see the user profiles. This extension is open source: https://github.com/sungwoncho/hacker-news-hover-profile.
